features.title: Features
body: Personnal access to a web plateform for imaging trial management
Anonymization and upload of DICOMs without third party app
5 Roles that could be given to users for each study : Investigator, Monitor, Controller, Supervisor, Reviewer
Administrator role for management of the plateform
Central review management with automatic adjudication
Emails alerts when intervention is required
Audit Trail of each action in the plateform
RestAPIs to connect with third party DICOM viewer

videos.title: In videos
carousel-legend: Example : Study, visit and user creation

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: GaelO is powered by Pixilib, Toulouse, France

license.title: License and contributions
license.body: GaelO platform is AGPL v.3 licenced.

ourviews.title: Our Vision
ourviews.body1: GaelO est né du constat des difficultés pour l’exploitation de l’imagerie en recherche clinique académiques. Trop souvent, les échanges d’images sont réalisés avec des moyens artisanaux ( échange de CD / Clé USB ou via des services en ligne de partage de fichiers non appropriés pour la recherche clinique).
ourviews.body2: Parce que les chercheurs méritent mieux, nous avons voulu proposer une solution qui vous aide à collecter les données d’imagerie depuis les centres investigateurs, à assurer une interprétation centralisée et à monitorer efficacement la progression de votre essai clinique.
ourviews.subtitle: Nos clés de succès

efficacity.definition: A platform designed with researchers in mind and that meets their needs. The user experience is our main guide to provide an ever more innovative platform.

intuitivity.definition: We believe that an imaging platform should be intuitive to use without the need for specific training.

reactivity.definition: A fast and also scalable platform, we want to be at the forefront of new imaging challenges

liberty.definition: Your imagery should be available at any time without restrictions on use. We believe that research is better off without locks.

source.definition: The vast majority of our solutions are open source. We are constantly contributing to open source projects structuring imaging, we believe that good research is open research.

study.title: A clinical study corresponding to a clinical research project
content: For example: DESCART study, real-life registry of Car-T Cell treatment

nPatient.title: Corresponds to patients included in a study.
content: A patient is defined by a pseudonymization code.
GaelO also manages study exits such as withdrawal of consent

nVisite.title: A visit is the realization of an imaging acquisition
content: Whatever the modality (CT, MR, X-ray, NM, PT, RT...)
Example: Baseline CT and CT at the end of the treatment

nReviews.title: Interpretation of an imaging by an expert doctor
content: We customize GaelO to insert the form (imaging e-CRF) of your choice (RECIST, PERCIST, Lugano ...)
The reviews can be scheduled to be multiple and blind (and possibly after adjudication)

conclusion.title: Final decision of medical interpretation
content: Your data are collected in real time and available at any time

investigator.title: investigator
investigator.content: Sending imagery from the investigator site

controller.title: Controller
controller.content: Centralized quality control of shipments before medical interpretation

supervisor.title: Supervisor
supervisor.content: Study management (progress monitoring, data access, corrective actions)

service.title: Our Services
service.intro: We have designated a service offer adapted to academics. Beyond the technological aspect, this is one of the greatest innovations brought to the clinical research ecosystem in imaging
service.content: The service offer is edited by Pixilib and proposes GaelO turnkey, installed and hosted on a server located in France, maintained by the creators of GaelO and ensures you a complete availability of the platform.

Complete.title: Complete
Complete.back: You will automatically benefit from GaelO's evolutions, we don't like two speed search

Unique.title: Unique
Unique.back: We prefer to use our time innovating rather than editing offers

Simple.title: Simple
Simple.back: No unit cost per patient, exam, user, centre. Include a few more patients, open an additional centre is no longer a problem!

Predictable.title: Predictable
Predictable.back: Your budget is often fixed, we believe that the price should be predictable from the start of your study

Affordable.title: Affordable
Affordable.back: Serieusement ! Nos clients négocient rarement notre prix, nous préférons nous concentrer sur notre valeur ajoutée : l’innovation.
